author: MARK SHERMAN and DARLENE SUPERVILLE Associated Press
title: Fauci says 'rolling reentry' of US economy possible in May
description: The United States’ top infectious disease expert says new cases of the coronavirus are sure to follow when restrictions imposed to limit the spread of the virus are eased
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
New cases of the coronavirus are certain to arise when restrictions imposed to limit the spread of the virus are eased, said Dr. Anthony Fauci, the top infectious disease expert for the U.S.
But Fauci said Sunday that the economy in parts of … [+5267 chars]
